#   Electronic Arts (EA) Blocklist
#   
#   Electronic Arts (EA) is a global video game publisher known for popular
#   franchises such as FIFA, Battlefield, The Sims, and Apex Legends. EA's
#   online services support multiplayer gaming, matchmaking, content delivery,
#   and digital store operations across millions of users worldwide.
#   
#   This blocklist contains IP addresses associated with EA servers. Using it
#   will prevent EA services from accessing your server, blocking game traffic,
#   updates, and online interactions from their network.
#   
#   IGN Blocklist
#   
#   IGN is a media network focused on gaming, entertainment, and technology
#   news, reviews, and videos. Its online services include website traffic,
#   content feeds, and API access to news articles, game guides, and videos.
#   
#   This blocklist contains IP addresses associated with IGN servers. Using it
#   will prevent IGN from accessing your server, blocking content feeds,
#   automated crawlers, and other interactions from their network.
